00012 void Usage(char* argv[])
00013 {
00014   cout << endl;
00015   cout << " This program compares the dead layers from two data files."<<endl;
00016   cout << " Default output for -z test is " << ofile << endl;
00017   cout << " Usage of " << argv[0] <<endl;
00018   cout << " -f <RunID>        : check dead layer consitency between <RunID> and whatever config file";
00019   cout <<                     " defined in run.db" <<endl;
00020   cout << " -z <RunID>        : check the quality of dead layer fit for <RunID>" <<endl ;
00021   cout << " -s                : CONFIG*=<RunID> instead of CONFIG=<RunID> def:off" << endl << endl;
00022   exit(-1);
00023 
00024   return;
00025 }

00051           cerr << "\n Cannot create output file " << ofile << "." << endl;

00194                 if(fabs(deadwidth[0][ii]-deadwidth[1][ii])>dlayer_consistency)
00195                 {
00196                         dead_layers_consistent=false;
00197                 }
00198         }
00199         cout << endl;
00200

00202         {

00206         }

00208         {
00209                 cout<<"finished: dead layers are NOT consistent"<<endl;
00210                 printf("******************************************************************************\n\n");
00211                 return 0;
00212         }

00234 int readDLayer(char *infile)
00235 {
00236         double deadwidth[strips_per_detector*num_detectors + 10];
00237         double t0[strips_per_detector*num_detectors + 10];
00238         int countstrip=0;
00239 
00240         ifstream configFile;
00241 
00242         configFile.open(infile);
00243 
00244         if (!configFile) {
00245                 cerr << "failed to open Config File : " << infile << endl;
00246                 return -1;
00247         }
00248 
00249         char *tempchar;
00250 
00251         char buffer[300];
00252         int stripn;
00253         float t0n, ecn, edeadn, a0n, a1n, ealphn, dwidthn, peden;
00254         float c0n, c1n, c2n, c3n, c4n;
00255 
00256         int linen=0;
00257         while (!configFile.eof()) {
00258 
00259                 configFile.getline(buffer, sizeof(buffer), '\n');
00260                 if (strstr(buffer,"Channel")!=0) {
00261 
00262                         tempchar = strtok(buffer,"l");
00263                         stripn = atoi(strtok(NULL, "="));
00264                         t0n = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00265                         ecn = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00266                         edeadn = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00267                         a0n = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00268                         a1n = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00269                         ealphn = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00270                         dwidthn = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00271                         peden = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00272                         c0n = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00273                         c1n = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00274                         c2n = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00275                         c3n = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00276                         c4n = atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00277 
00278                         deadwidth[stripn-1]=dwidthn;
00279                         t0[stripn-1]=t0n;
00280                 }
00281 
00282                 linen ++;
00283         }
00284 
00285         configFile.close();
00286 
00287         for(unsigned short detector=0;detector<num_detectors;detector++)
00288         {
00289           // for detector active/non-active test
00290           float t0_ref=0;
00291 
00292                 countstrip = 0;
00293       t0_diff_sum[detector] = 0;
00294 
00295                 for(unsigned short strip=0;strip<strips_per_detector;strip++)
00296                   {
00297                         if(isStripAlive(strips_per_detector*detector + strip)==true)
00298                         {
00299                                 countstrip++;
00300                                 tempwidth[detector]+=deadwidth[strips_per_detector*detector + strip];
00301                         }
00302 
00303                         // reference t0 is always the first strip in detector. calculate diff.
00304                         if (!strip) t0_ref = t0[strips_per_detector*detector + strip];
00305                         t0_diff_sum[detector] += fabs(t0_ref - t0[strips_per_detector*detector + strip]);
00306 
00307                 }
00308                 if(countstrip!=0)
00309                 {
00310                         tempwidth[detector]=(tempwidth[detector]/((float)countstrip));
00311                 }
00312                 else
00313                 {
00314                         cout<<"warning: detector "<<detector<<" has no live strips"<<endl;
00315                 }
00316 
00317         }
00318 
00319         return 1;
00320 }
00321 
00322 
00323 bool isStripAlive(unsigned short strp)
00324 {
00325    for (int jj=0; jj<gMeasInfo->GetNumDisabledChannels(); jj++) {
00326       if ( (int) strp == gMeasInfo->IsDisabledChannel(jj+1)) {
00327          return false;
00328       }
00329    }
00330 
00331    return true;
00332 }

00334 
00335 void checkChi2(char *infile)
00336 {
00337         ifstream DlayerFile;
00338         fitresult=1;
00339 
00340         DlayerFile.open(infile);
00341 
00342         if (!DlayerFile) {
00343                 cerr << "failed to open DlayerFit File : " << infile << endl;
00344                 fitresult=-1;
00345                 return ;
00346         }
00347 
00348         char buffer[300];
00349         float chi2;
00350         char *fitstatus;
00351 
00352         int counter=0;
00353         while (counter<NSTRIP) {
00354 
00355                 DlayerFile.getline(buffer, sizeof(buffer), '\n');
00356                 if (strchr(buffer,' ')==NULL) break;
00357 
00358                 // get Strip #, chi2 and fitting status from buffer
00359                 int stripID=atoi(strtok(buffer," "));
00360 
00361                 for(short ii=0;ii<7;ii++)   strtok(NULL," ");
00362                 chi2=atof(strtok(NULL," "));
00363                 strtok(NULL," ");
00364                 fitstatus=strtok(NULL," ");
00365 
00366                   // ignore if strip is disabled in run.db
00367                   if(isStripAlive(stripID)==true) {
00368 
00369                     // test chi2
00370                     if(chi2>chi2max)
00371                       {
00372                         cout<< "chi2 = "<< chi2 << " exceeds limit " << chi2max << " in strip #" << stripID+1 <<endl;
00373                         fitresult=0;
00374                         break;
00375                       }
00376 
00377                     // test fitting status
00378                     string ss=fitstatus;
00379                     if(ss!="SUCCESSFUL")
00380                       {
00381                         cout<<fitstatus<<endl;
00382                         cout<<"fit status not successful for strip "<<stripID<<endl;
00383                         fitresult=0;
00384                         break;
00385                       }
00386 
00387                   }// end-if-isStripAlive()
00388 
00389                   counter++;
00390         }
00391 
00392         return;
00393 }
